static void main (String[] args) throws Exception

Detailed Description

Replace pixel values with 1 or 0 depending on whether they are above or below a single threshold.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

static void edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SimpleThresholder.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00045                                                             {
00046         // create output directory
00047         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("threshold");
00048         
00049         // read input
00050         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA);
00051         popdensity.setMissing(0); // transparent
00052         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "popdensity", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00053         
00054         // threshold
00055         SimpleThresholder filter = new SimpleThresholder(100);
00056         LatLonGrid thresh = filter.threshold(popdensity);
00057         KmlWriter.write(thresh, out, "highdensity", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00058     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SimpleThresholder.threshold ( final LatLonGrid  input  )  

00033                                                        {
00034         LatLonGrid output = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input);
00035         int[][] outData = output.getData();
00036         int[][] inData = input.getData();
00037         for (int i=0; i < output.getNumLat(); ++i){
00038             for (int j=0; j < output.getNumLon(); ++j){
00039                 outData[i][j] = (inData[i][j] >= thresh)? 1 : 0;
00040             }
00041         }
00042         return output;
00043     }
